data.text:
It seems like the enchantment and quality that Marina Vista Hotel once held for me are unfortunately fading away. I want to share my recent experience to inform fellow travelers about the changing state of the hotel.

Firstly, the overall condition of the hotel is not as impressive as it used to be. The architecture and decor appear to have moved away from the former splendor and elegance. Rooms lack the previous meticulous maintenance and cleanliness.

The staff didn't exhibit the warmth and helpfulness I experienced during my previous visits. I struggled to get responses to my requests in some instances, and there was a noticeable communication gap.

The facilities and services offered by the hotel were also not as appealing as before. The restaurant menu seemed to have narrowed, and the food quality didn't meet the standards set in my previous visits.

In conclusion, Marina Vista Hotel might not be experiencing its heyday anymore. Considering these changes, future guests should weigh their choices carefully.
data.title: Might Not Be as Charming as It Used to Be

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest Elmasghr,

We would like to thank you for your recent stay at Double Tree by Hilton Bodrum Marina Vista Bodrum. Also we  appreciate your time to express your valuable feedback regarding your visit, as it is instrumental in helping us identify the areas in which we can potentially improve.
We are very sorry because of your dissatisfaction.
Please be confident that we will share the points you have outlined with the Hotel Management and Head of the Departments.

We always strive to provide the highest level of service and we appreciate your valuable feedback.
We look forward to welcoming you again soon and showing our best for your spend a enjoyable and comfortable holidays in Double Tree by Hilton Marina Vista Hotel.

Thanks for your understanding.

Best regards,
Hazim Erceylan
owner_response.author: hazim erceylan

data.text: What can we say, this hotel is a gem and the staff are so freindly, special mention too Zeliah and Mahmut as nothing is to much hassle, it’s like coming to see your family. Rooms are lovely and big and always kept clean and replenished by housekeeping. The breakfast is plentiful with ample choice. The pool is the winner as it’s a perfect size, is never overcrowded and the area is peaceful. The big chef restaurant serves a nice selection of meals and for the area is not overly expensive, special mention to Erdum who makes you welcome.
data.title: Family holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest Mikemuk1,
 
We are truly heartened to receive your generous review of DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Marina Vista . Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed your stay.
We look forward to having you with us again in the nearest future.

Kind regards,

Hazım Erceylan
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: hazim erceylan

data.text: Each year we travel around Turkey, because we love the country so much. We always try to stay at the Hilton Doubletree as it’s one of our favourite hotels. The staff, location and comfort along with the excellent garden pool make for a great stay.
data.title: One of our favourite hotels in Turkey.

data.text:
I stayed on two separate occasions and was happy with both.

The first stay was better. I was greeted by Nazli who welcomed me.as a Titanium member. I stayed in room 4204 and found a welcome note accompanied by some fruit and wine. Very nice touch.
(didn't receive this on my second stay)

The hotel.has everything you need. Nice building, superb location. Modern. Part of Hilton.

The areas that could be improved are:
- a printout or welcome letter explaining the facilities available and the times
- do not cool the pool. Most guests found the water temperature too cold to enjoy
- add a meat to breakfast 

Otherwise, a perfect stay.

Special thanks to Nazli. Great check in and service. Nice welcome gift of fruit and wine. Oh. the cookies are great too.
data.title: Nazli

data.text: A very beautiful and elegant hotel. The location is perfect for travelers who want to visit Bodrum. The hotel was full.. but we didn't feel noise or crowding. I traveled with a 1.5 year old baby girl and we received help and care from the entire hotel staff. Special thanks to Dora :)
data.title: A very beautiful and elegant hotel.
